name: Inner Workings
description:
Inner Workings is a 2D side-scrolling adventure platformer. Play as an unidentified ball of light and find yourself in a strange cave full of mutant lifeforms. You have no idea how you got here, but the only way out is forward. Solve puzzles and unlock memories in order to reach the end.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Spacebar to scan and advance dialogue

Made during the Global Game Jam 2023. Theme was "Roots".
